text: Charles Joseph Fleischmann ( ; born October 11, 1962) is an American attorney and politician. He has been the U.S. representative for since 2011. He is a member of the Republican Party. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Chuck Fleischmann official U.S. House website * Chuck Fleischmann for Congress * * ;Articles * "Fleischmann Introduces Bill To Terminate Government Weatherization Program" * "Boehner Struggles for Votes" Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Tennessee Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Lawyers from Tennessee Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Chuck Fleischmann
